member.name: P:screensaver.ItemListView`1.NumArticles
member.summary: Gets the number of articles that will be displayed.

member.name: P:screensaver.ItemListView`1.NumArticleRows
member.summary: Gets the number of rows that will appear in the display.
member.remarks: This may be more than NumArticles if there are less articles available than would fill up the minimum number of rows.

member.summary: Draws a box and border ontop of which the text of the items can be drawn.
member.param: The Graphics object to draw onto

member.summary: Dispose all disposable fields

member.name: T:screensaver.ItemListView`1
member.summary: Encapsulates the rendering of a list of items. Each item's description is shown in a list, and a single item is selected.
member.typeparam: The type of item that this ItemListView will draw.

member.name: T:screensaver.IItem
member.summary: A generealization of an item with a Description and Title. Any implmentation of IItem can be rendered using the ItemListView and ItemDescriptionView types.

member.summary: Build an RSSChannel from an XmlNode representing a Channel element inside an RSS 2.0 XML document.

member.name: T:screensaver.RssChannel
member.summary: Representation of a Channel element in an RSS 2.0 XML document.
member.remarks: One or more RssChannels are contained in an RssFeed. Use MainChannel property to access the primary channel.

member.name: M:screensaver.ScreenSaverForm.SetupScreenSaver
member.summary: Set up the main form as a full screen screensaver.

member.name: M:screensaver.ScreenSaverForm.LoadBackgroundImage
member.summary: Loads images from the specific location into memory for display.
member.remarks: Tries to load images from the user-specified path, else uses default images saved in resource designer.

member.name: M:screensaver.ScreenSaverForm.LoadRssFeed
member.summary: Loads RSS feed data from the user-specified location.
member.remarks: Tries to load from the user specified URI, else loads static error text data from the Settings designer.

member.summary: Initialize display properties of the rssView.

member.name: M:screensaver.ScreenSaverForm.InitializeRssDescriptionView
member.summary: Initialize display properties of the rssDescriptionView.

member.name: T:screensaver.ScreenSaverForm
member.summary: Screen responsible for rendering the primary visual content of the screen saver.
member.remarks: The form is entirely custom drawn using GDI+ graphics objects. To alter display, modify graphics code or host new UI controls on the form.

member.name: M:screensaver.RssFeed.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Private constructor to be used with factory pattern.
member.param: An XML block containing the RSSFeed content.

member.summary: Construct an RSSFeed object from a uri pointing to a valid RSS 2.0 XML file.
member.exception: Occurs when the uri cannot be located on the web.
member.param: The URL to read the RSS feed from.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:screensaver.My.Resources.Resources.DefaultRSSText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <rss version="2.0"><channel><title>RSS Feed Not Available</title><link>http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/rss.xml</link><description>The RSS feed could not be loaded.</description><language>en-us</language><ttl>1440</ttl><item><title>You may not be connected to the internet.</title><description>If you are trying to use an RSS feed on the internet check your Internet connection.</description><link>http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/rss.xml</link></item><item><title>Try selecting a different RSS feed.</title><des[rest of String was truncated]";.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
